solution_line_template: On Friday Walmart sold {friday_multiplier} * {thursday_sales} pounds = <<{friday_multiplier}*{thursday_sales}={friday_sales}>>{friday_sales} pounds.
For all three days Walmart sold {thursday_sales} + {friday_sales} + {saturday_sales} pounds = <<{thursday_sales}+{friday_sales}+{saturday_sales}={total_sales}>>{total_sales} pounds.
The average amount of beef sold per day is {total_sales} pounds / {number_of_days} days = <<{total_sales}/{number_of_days}={average_sales}>>{average_sales} pounds.
